name: cymulate-asm
label: Cymulate ASM
description:
The Cymulate Exposure Management and Security Validation Platform provides the technology for exposure
discovery, validation, and prioritization with business insights and intelligence. This simplifies security leadersâ€™ risk
and resilience to emergent threats and a rapidly changing attack surface. With a complete view of the security
posture and business risks, the Cymulate platform gives security leaders the data they need to define the scope for cyber initiatives, successfully mobilize mitigations, and continuously assess security operations performance.

fields.name: url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the Cymulate server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: key
fields.title: Secret Key
fields.tooltip: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.
fields.description: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. 
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Create Internal Assessment
operations.description: Create a specific Internal ASM assessment in Cymulate ASM.

parameters.name: name
parameters.title: Assessment Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the assessment.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the assessment.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Assessment Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the assessment.
parameters.description: Specify the description of the assessment.

parameters.name: selectedPlatforms
parameters.title: Platforms
parameters.tooltip: Specify the platforms for example Azure, Active Directory, AWS, GCP you can specify multiple platforms as comma-separated values.
parameters.description: Specify the platforms for example Azure, Active Directory, AWS, GCP you can specify multiple platforms as comma-separated values.

parameters.name: crownJewels
parameters.title: Crown Jewels
parameters.tooltip: Specify the crown jewels (Important resources on which to create assessment).
parameters.description: Specify the crown jewels (Important resources on which to create assessment).

parameters.name: scheduledFor
parameters.title: Schedule For
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time at which assessment should be triggered.
parameters.description: Specify the time at which assessment should be triggered.

parameters.name: scheduleLoop
parameters.title: Schedule Loop
parameters.tooltip: Specify the frequency for triggering the assessment eg: one-time.
parameters.description: Specify the frequency for triggering the assessment eg: one-time.

operations.title: Get Assessment List
operations.description: Retrieve the ASM assessment history within the date range provided. If a date range is not provided, the response will retrieve the history from the last 30 days.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.title: From Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date from where to fetch assessments.
parameters.description: Specify the date from where to fetch assessments.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.title: To Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date until which assessments should be fetched.
parameters.description: Specify the date until which assessments should be fetched.

operations.title: Get Findings List For Latest Assessment
operations.description: Retrieve all findings generated in the latest ASM assessment from Cymulate ASM.

operations.title: Get Findings List By Assessment ID
operations.description: Retrieve all findings generated in a specific ASM assessment from Cymulate ASM.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its findings.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its findings.

operations.title: Get Assets List For Latest Assessment
operations.description: Retrieve a list of assets from the latest assessment from Cymulate ASM.

operations.title: Get Assets List By Assessment ID
operations.description: Retrieve a list of assets for a specific assessment from Cymulate ASM.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its assets.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID to fetch its assets.

operations.title: Get Internal Assessment List
operations.description: Retrieve Internal ASM assessments from Cymulate ASM.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit of how many items to get (min - 1000, max - 10000) - Default = 100.
parameters.description: Specify the limit of how many items to get (min - 1000, max - 10000) - Default = 100.

operations.title: Get Internal Assessment By ID
operations.description: Retrieve a specific Internal ASM assessment from Cymulate ASM.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID for which you want to fetch the details from Cymulate ASM.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID for which you want to fetch the details from Cymulate ASM.

operations.title: Delete Internal Assessment By ID
operations.description: Delete a specific Internal ASM assessment from Cymulate ASM.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID which you want to delete from Cymulate ASM.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID which you want to delete from Cymulate ASM.
